text: Anna Maria Hall (6 January 1800 â€“ 30 January 1881) was an Irish novelist. She published as "Mrs. S. C. Hall". She was born as Anna Maria Fielding in Dublin, but left Ireland for England at the age of 15. At that time, published her first original work, Sketches of Irish character, in 1828. Her first work was well received, Anna Maria Hall was married to the writer Samuel Carter Hall from 1824. Category:1800 births Category:1881 deaths Category:Irish novelists
title: Anna Maria Hall
